content: Proclamation Against the King of Tyre
The word of the  came to me again, saying,
“Son of man, say to the prince of Tyre, ‘Thus says the Lord :
Lamentation for the King of Tyre
Moreover the word of the  came to me, saying,
“Son of man, take up a lamentation for the king of Tyre, and say to him, ‘Thus says the Lord :
Then the word of the  came to me, saying,
“Son of man, set your face toward Sidon, and prophesy against her,
“And there shall no longer be a pricking brier or a painful thorn for the house of Israel from among all  around them, who despise them. Then they shall know that I  the Lord .”

‘Thus says the Lord : “When I have gathered the house of Israel from the peoples among whom they are scattered, and am hallowed in them in the sight of the Gentiles, then they will dwell in their own land which I gave to My servant Jacob.

And they will dwell safely there, build houses, and plant vineyards; yes, they will dwell securely, when I execute judgments on all those around them who despise them. Then they shall know that I  the  their God.” ’ ”
